utter_chitchat/ask_how_are_you.text: I am fine, thanks a lot for asking!
I am very good, thank you!

utter_chitchat/goodfeedback.text: Thank you for your kind words. Your feedback has been recorded. Can I do something else for you?

utter_chitchat/badfeedback.text: Thank you for your feedback. Considering your feedback, I will work to improve myself!

utter_chitchat/mood_unhappy.text: Sorry to hear that, what can I do for you?
I am sorry to hear that, can I do something for you?

utter_chitchat/ask_joke.text: Why do we tell actors to 'break a leg'? Because every play has a cast :)
Hear about the new restaurant karma? There is no menu: You get what you deserve :)
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything :)
